fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Set a trap up at someoneâ€™s house.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Traps take one day to build. When building a trap, you will gain control and roleblock immunity.

- When you have a trap built, you may place it at any player's house.

- If a player with a trap is visited, the trap will trigger, telling you the role of every visitor.

- If a player with a trap is visited by a Neutral Killing role, an attacking Neutral Chaos role, or a member of the Mafia performing the factional Mafia kill, the trap will trigger, attacking the visitor.

- Traps do not give your target any defense.

- You may only have one trap out at a time, but the night after you place a trap, you will spend the night building another trap.

- You have one bulletproof vest that gives you Basic defense. You may use it on any night, instead of protecting someone. This will also take the place of building a trap, if applicable.
